alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 06 at 2:57PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ANIMAS RIVER BASIN...SOUTHWEST SAN JUAN MOUNTAINS...AND SAN JUAN RIVER BASIN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 257 PM MST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 13 miles northeast of Dulce to near Bayfield and moving southwest at 15 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Bayfield around 300 PM MST. Ignacio around 315 PM MST. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 1 and 10. U.S. Highway 84 in Colorado between mile markers 10 and 27. U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 93 and 151. Colorado 151 between mile markers 1 and 33. Colorado 172 between mile markers 1 and 22. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
